title: DeepSeek AI
description: Generates responses from the DeepSeek Chat LLM using a prompt and an optional session parameter.

response.response: This is the answer from the model.

curl:
curl -X POST \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN" \
  'https://bovalone.me/api/deepseek' \
  -d '{"prompt": "What is DeepSeek AI?", "session": "cltxy5m1d0001mr0f45fovk0z"}'
